outputs.output_descr:
Dialogue Financing Facility  is implemented in participation with the government, UN Agencies, other development partners, civil society, faith based organizations, churches and other non-state actors.

The expected outcomes of the DFF implemented initiatives and activities will include:

1. Increased public participation in decision making on national issues
2. Strengthened processes that seek to support maintenance of peace, national healing and nation building
3. Strengthened national forums that promote social policy dialogue
4. Progress made towards improved international perceptions of Zimbabwe

project_descr: The Dialogue Financing Facility seeks to strengthen dialogue capacities and mechanisms for consensus building, peaceful co-existence, Social Cohesion and sustainable development in Zimbabwe
